  • Method Details

    • registerStorageManager

      void registerStorageManager(@NonNull StorageManagerContract storageManager)
      Call this methods to register the optional storage manager that can be used by the SDK to maintain the values for claims and other data.
      Parameters:
      storageManager - Implementation of StorageManager interface

    • getStorageManager

      StorageManagerContract getStorageManager()

    • getDataRepository

      DataRepository getDataRepository()
      Call this methods to get the data repository that can be used by the SDK to maintain the values for claims and other data.
      Returns:
      An instance of the DataRepository using registered StorageManagerContract

    • registerCallbackHandler

      void registerCallbackHandler(@NonNull WalletCallbackHandler callbackHandler)
      Call this method to register your wallet and create a new application instance for your wallet. If an application instance already exists, the SDK will retrieve the same instead of creating a new one.
      Parameters:
      callbackHandler - Instance of WalletCallbackHandler to handle important events such as credential issuance/revocation etc.

    • pairWallet

      com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance pairWallet(@NonNull PairingRequest pairingRequest, @Nullable String pushToken) throws WalletException
      Throws:
      WalletException

    • pairWallet

      com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance pairWallet(@NonNull PresentationRequest presentationRequest, @Nullable String pushToken) throws WalletException
      Call this method to pair your wallet app for future issuance and receive credential updates
      Parameters:
      presentationRequest - Request from service for wallet pairing containing the issuer ID and session id required for pairing
      pushToken - Optional push token
      Returns:
      ApplicationInstance Updated application instance for storage if a push token was supplied
      Throws:
      WalletException - Error when pairing wallet This method is deprecated and will be removed in upcoming updates. Use handleEvent instead

    • updatePushToken

      com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance updatePushToken(@NonNull String pushToken)
      Deprecated.
      Update firebase push token to receive notifications from the service
      Parameters:
      pushToken - Firebase Push Token

    • updatePushTokens

      List<com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance> updatePushTokens(String pushToken)
      Update firebase push token to receive notifications from the service
      Parameters:
      pushToken - Firebase Push Token
      Returns:
      List of updated ApplicationInstance

    • processQrContent

      void processQrContent(String qrContent)
      Handle the URL for issuance or presentation.
      Parameters:
      qrContent - Raw content from the QR code This method is deprecated and will be removed in upcoming updates. Use processPingOneRequest instead

    • processPingOneRequest

      void processPingOneRequest(String request)
      Forward content from QR codes and universal links for processing. Make sure to register the callbackhandler beforehand to receive the result.
      Parameters:
      request - : Raw content from the QR code

    • processNotification

      boolean processNotification(Map<Object,Object> userInfo)
      Forward content from push notifications payload for processing. Make sure to register the callbackhandler beforehand to receive the result.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - : Push notification payload
      Returns:
      boolean that is true if the notification can be handled by Wallet SDK and false if the SDK cannot recognize it as a PingOne notification

    • checkForMessages

      void checkForMessages()
      Check if there are any pending messages

    • findMatchingCredentialsForRequest

      PresentationMatcherResult findMatchingCredentialsForRequest(@NonNull PresentationRequest presentationRequest, @NonNull List<com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim> claims)
      Call this method to filter the verifiable credentials that match the schema defined in the input descriptor in the presentation request.
      Parameters:
      presentationRequest - Presentation Request for the verifiable credential
      claims - List of claims saved in the Wallet
      Returns:
      PresentationMatcherResult that contains the list of VerifiableCredentials matching the criteria defined in the presentation request

    • presentCredentials

      io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single<PresentationResult> presentCredentials(@NonNull CredentialsPresentation presentation)
      Call this methods to send the verifiable presentation to the redirect uri defined in the presentation request.
      Parameters:
      presentation - CredentialPresentation object containing filtered credentials and presentation request
      Returns:
      VerifiablePresentationResult result returned after credential presentation

    • reportCredentialDeletion

      void reportCredentialDeletion(@NonNull com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim claim)
      Report when a credential is deleted from the Wallet.
      Parameters:
      claim - Claim that was deleted from wallet
